main_definition: Masturbating refers to the act of stimulating one's own genitals, typically with the intention of sexual pleasure.

meanings_and_examples.example: Tom masturbated in his bedroom late at night.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal term often used to describe private sexual activities
meanings_and_examples.example: His friends made jokes about him 'masturbating' when he was alone and not aware of their presence.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A common misconception or slang referring to self-pleasure, which is a normal part of human sexuality
meanings_and_examples.example: Many adults masturbate as it can be a healthy way to explore one's body and understand personal preferences.
